hymn.title: Pursue Christ
hymn.chords: | C - Em - | F - G - | C - Em - | F - G - | C - Em - | F - G7 - | C - Em - | F - G7 - |

layout.singingstanza: Pur -- sue Christ, Gain Christ, Be found in Christ. Mag -- ni -- fy Christ; This is the way to ex -- pe -- ri -- ence Christ.

lyrics.stanza: Pursue Christ, Gain Christ, Be found in Christ. Magnify Christ; This is the way to experience Christ.
